pr_title: Made minor corrections to all KeyVault READMEs.

timeline.message: Made minor corrections to all KeyVault READMEs.

timeline.bodyText: Instead of \n, it is preferred to use %n because it will give a platform-dependent new line.
timeline.author: samvaity

timeline.bodyText: Also, a nit I guess but we do follow printf() pattern for samples in other libraries.
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: I see, then we should be changing all our READMES and samples to follow this pattern at some point.
replies.author: vcolin7

timeline.bodyText: do we need the explicit toString()?
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: Good catch, we shouldn't need it as far as I know.
replies.author: vcolin7

timeline.message: Fixed minor grammar issues and added quotation marks where needed.

Add azure-data-appconfiguration as an AdditionalModule to Keyvault (#13647)

(cherry picked from commit b75d7322d3f44f311a08425c817c7804e7600432)
Made minor fix for the sake of consistency.
